name: Smart Compression
details: It’s compression that moves more blood to help prevent stasis. That tracks compliance with Patient Sensing technology.
features: Hospitalized patients develop VTE each year.
Hospitalized patients receive appropriate prevention measures.

name: Thermometers
details: From single to dual-scale, our digital thermometers measure temperature rapidly and accurately in either Fahrenheit or Celsius.
features: Auto turn-off after five (5) minutes of inactivity.

name: Electronic Thermometer
details: The Electronic thermometer utilizes advanced technology to provide the accurate and fast readings in multiple easy-to-use formats.
features: Ready to use out of the box.
Stands upright on a flat surface.

name: Stethoscopes
details: Single-patient-use stethoscopes help to prevent cross-contamination, with single-patient-use options available in all plastic.
features: Choose from a variety of colors.

name: Recording Paper
details: Cardinal Health manufactures one the largest offerings of recording chart papers in the industry.

name: Disposable NPWT
details: Disposable NPWT solutions can help reduce the risk of cross-contamination that may lead to costly events readmissions.
features: High performance with a powerful yet quiet motor.

name: Alginate Dressings
details: Dressing absorbs exudate, forms a gel that keeps the wound moist and protects from contamination.

name: Hydrocolloids
details: Hydrocolloid dressings consist of a wound contact layer of hydrocolloids and a semi-permeable, polyurethane film backing.

name: Cardiothoracic
details: Innovative solutions for every situation. Cardinal Health offers a complete line of chest drainage products and accessories.

name: Stuff Cooling
details: The untethered solution to keep clinicians cool and comfortable in the OR.

name: Rollator Walkers
details: Our rollators offer a safe and durable option for assisting you with your mobility.

name: Surgical Gloves
details: You give everything to your patients, it’s who you are.  Just as it’s in your instinct to provide care.
features: Second-skin comfort of natural rubber latex.
